00023 #ifndef _CTK_SPU_DMA_LIST_H
00024 #define _CTK_SPU_DMA_LIST_H
00025 
00031 #include "../ctk_common.h"

00033 #ifdef __SPU__
00034 
00035 #ifdef __cplusplus
00036 extern "C" {
00037 #endif
00038 
00042 typedef struct {
00043     ctk_uint64_t notify:1;        
00044     ctk_uint64_t reserved:15;
00045     ctk_uint64_t size:16;         
00046     ctk_uint64_t eal:32;          
00047 } ctk_dma_list_elem_t;
00048 
00055 typedef struct {
00056     ls_addr_t           ls_base;
00057     ea_addr32_t         ea_base;        
00058     unsigned int        nelems;         
00059     ctk_dma_list_elem_t elems[16] __attribute__((aligned(8)));
00060 } ctk_dma_list_t;
00061 
00066 typedef struct {
00067     ls_addr_t           ls_base;
00068     ea_addr32_t         ea_base;        
00069     unsigned int        nelems;         
00070     ctk_dma_list_elem_t *elems;         
00071 } ctk_dma_list_va_t;
00072 
00079 static inline void
00080 ctk_dma_list_init(ctk_dma_list_t *list, void *ls_base, ea_addr_t ea_base)
00081 {
00082     list->ls_base = ptr2int(ls_base);
00083     list->ea_base = ea_hi32(ea_base);
00084     list->nelems = 0;
00085 }
00086 
00095 static inline void
00096 ctk_dma_list_va_init(ctk_dma_list_va_t *list, void *ls_base, ea_addr_t ea_base)
00097 {
00098     list->ls_base = ptr2int(ls_base);
00099     list->ea_base = ea_hi32(ea_base);
00100     list->nelems = 0;
00101 }
00102 
00111 static inline void
00112 ctk_dma_list_va_alloc_elems(ctk_dma_list_va_t *list, int max_elems)
00113 {
00114     list->elems = __cast(ctk_dma_list_elem_t *,
00115             ctk_malloc_align(max_elems * sizeof(ctk_dma_list_elem_t), 8));
00116 }
00117 
00123 static inline void
00124 ctk_dma_list_va_free_elems(ctk_dma_list_va_t *list)
00125 {
00126     ctk_free_align(list->elems);
00127 }
00128 
00139 #define ctk_dma_list_va_alloca_elems(list, max_elems)    \
00140     char _tmp_ ## list[ALIGN_UP((max_elems)*sizeof(ctk_dma_list_t), 8) + 8]; \
00141     (list)->elems = (void*)ALIGN_UP(_tmp_ ## list, 8);
00142 
00149 static inline void
00150 ctk_dma_list_add_elem(ctk_dma_list_t *list, ea_addr_t ea, size_t size)
00151 {
00152     list->elems[list->nelems].eal = ea_lo32(ea);
00153     list->elems[list->nelems].size = size;
00154     list->nelems++;
00155 }
00156 
00163 static inline void
00164 ctk_dma_list_va_add_elem(ctk_dma_list_va_t *list, ea_addr_t ea, size_t size)
00165 {
00166     list->elems[list->nelems].eal = ea_lo32(ea);
00167     list->elems[list->nelems].size = size;
00168     list->nelems++;
00169 }
00170 
00180 static inline void
00181 ctk_dma_list_transfer(ctk_dma_list_t *list, int tag, int cmd)
00182 {
00183     int listsize;
00184     CTK_DEBUG_ASSERT(list != NULL);
00185     listsize = list->nelems * sizeof(ctk_dma_list_elem_t);
00186     spu_mfcdma64((void*)list->ls_base, list->ea_base,
00187         ptr2int(&list->elems[0]), listsize, tag, (cmd | 0x4));
00188 }
00189 
00199 static inline void
00200 ctk_dma_list_va_transfer(ctk_dma_list_va_t *list, int tag, int cmd)
00201 {
00202     int listsize;
00203     CTK_DEBUG_ASSERT(list != NULL);
00204     listsize = list->nelems * sizeof(ctk_dma_list_elem_t);
00205     spu_mfcdma64((void*)list->ls_base, list->ea_base,
00206         ptr2int(list->elems), listsize, tag, (cmd | 0x4));
00207 }

00215 static inline void
00216 ctk_dma_list_get(ctk_dma_list_t *list, int tag)
00217 {
00218     ctk_dma_list_transfer(list, tag, MFC_GET_CMD);
00219 }
00220 
00226 static inline void
00227 ctk_dma_list_getf(ctk_dma_list_t *list, int tag)
00228 {
00229     ctk_dma_list_transfer(list, tag, MFC_GETF_CMD);
00230 }

00238 ctk_dma_list_getb(ctk_dma_list_t *list, int tag)

00247 static inline void
00248 ctk_dma_list_get_block(ctk_dma_list_t *list)
00249 {
00250     int tag = ctk_dma_new_tag();
00251     ctk_dma_list_transfer(list, tag, MFC_GET_CMD);
00252     ctk_dma_wait(tag);
00253 }
00254

00260 ctk_dma_list_getf_block(ctk_dma_list_t *list)

00262     int tag = ctk_dma_new_tag();

00264     ctk_dma_wait(tag);
00265 }
